´ {diacrit} :: letter: á, É, é, Í
˚ {diacrit} :: letter: ů
ˇ {diacrit} :: háček
ˇ {diacrit} :: marking partial palatalisation:
ˇ {diacrit} :: C, [ts] → Č, [tʃ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: R, [r] → Ř, [r̝] [before 1989: [ɼ]]
ˇ {diacrit} :: S, [s] → Š, [ʃ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: Z, [z] → Ž, [ʒ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: marking full palatalisation:
ˇ {diacrit} :: D, [d] → Ď, [ɟ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: N, [n] → Ň, [ɲ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: T, [t] → Ť, [c]
ˇ {diacrit} :: E, [ɛ] → Ě:
ˇ {diacrit} :: marking palatalisation of the preceding consonant:
ˇ {diacrit} :: de, [dɛ] → dě (not *ďe), [ɟɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: ne, [nɛ] → ně (not *ňe), [ɲɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: te, [tɛ] → tě (not *ťe), [cɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: marking iotation:
ˇ {diacrit} :: be, [bɛ] → bě, [bjɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: fe, [fɛ] → fě, [fjɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: pe, [pɛ] → pě, [pjɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: ve, [vɛ] → vě, [vjɛ]
ˇ {diacrit} :: me, [mɛ] → mě (not *mňe), [mɲɛ]
